pacify.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make someone calm, quiet, and satisfied after they have been angry or upset
pacify.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘You’re right, ’ Rita said, in order to pacify him.
pacify.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to stop groups of people from fighting or protesting, often by using force
pacify.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Economic reforms are needed to pacify and modernize the country.
